entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 11.
